videos.headline: Purdue WR beats defender to take early 7-0 lead
videos.description: WR Isaac Zico burns the coverage for a 36-yard touchdown, putting Purdue up early at 7-0.

videos.headline: Purdue QB throws dime over two defenders
videos.description: Purdue QB David Blough throws a perfect pass over two defenders for a 41-yard touchdown to Terry Wright, putting Purdue up 21-10.

videos.headline: Wright goes 82 yards for 2nd TD of game
videos.description: Terry Wright scores his 2nd touchdown of the game with an 82-yard score, putting Purdue up 28-17.

videos.headline: Brohm after win: Tyler Trent an inspiration to Purdue
videos.description: Purdue head coach Jeff Brohm puts Purdue's upset over No. 16 Iowa into words and explains the inspiration that Tyler Trent has brought to the program.

videos.headline: Tyler Trent describes what Purdue sports has done for him
videos.description: Tyler Trent explains his passion for Purdue sports and how it's helped him while battling terminal bone cancer.
